text: Jorge Arvizu (23 July 1932 - 18 March 2014) was a Mexican actor who was the first Spanish voice, among others, of Bugs Bunny, Fred Flintstone and Cookie Monster. His nickname is "El Tata". ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican movie producers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths
title: Jorge Arvizu
